title: Gesture-based Control System for AR Devices
abstract: A system that uses infrared sensors to detect hand movements and translate them into commands within augmented reality headsets.

title: Energy Efficient Implantable Medical Device
abstract: An implantable device using solar micro-cells to maintain battery charge and reduce energy consumption for long-term operations.

title: Swarm Coordination for Autonomous Drones
abstract: A communication protocol and method for autonomous unmanned aerial vehicles to coordinate in formation and task execution.

title: Smart Umbrella with Weather Sensing
abstract: An umbrella equipped with environmental sensors and wireless communication to alert the user of changing weather patterns.

title: AI-based Fraud Detection for Banking
abstract: A machine learning system that analyzes transaction patterns to identify and prevent fraudulent activity in financial networks.

title: Wearable Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Monitoring
abstract: A device worn on the wrist that continuously monitors heart rate, activity, and sleep patterns, syncing data to a mobile application.

title: Biodegradable Packaging Material
abstract: Packaging composed of plant-derived polymers that decompose naturally, reducing environmental waste.

title: Blockchain for Supply Chain Traceability
abstract: A system utilizing blockchain technology to ensure transparency and provenance tracking in global supply chains.

title: Quantum Computing Processor
abstract: An architecture for scalable quantum processors leveraging superconducting qubits and error correction techniques.

title: Remote Patient Monitoring Platform
abstract: A healthcare platform that aggregates data from various medical sensors, allowing physicians to monitor patient health remotely and in real time.

abstract: A system that uses infrared sensors to detect hand movements and translate them into commands within augmented reality headsets.

title: Energy Efficient Implantable Medical Device
abstract: An implantable device using solar micro-cells to maintain battery charge and reduce energy consumption for long-term operations.
